main_definition: The anointed one, Jesus of Nazareth in Christianity; also a term used to refer to the religious significance associated with Jesus.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A title for Jesus as the Messiah and Son of God
meanings_and_examples.example: The central figure of Christianity is referred to as Christ.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Symbolic representation used in various religious contexts, including art and literature
meanings_and_examples.example: In many paintings depicting the crucifixion, a cross with an 'X' above it is often shown as 'CRIST.'

meanings_and_examples.definition: A term used to refer to Christianity in general or its followers
meanings_and_examples.example: Christian communities around the world gather for worship and fellowship.
